Uses of LongRangeSetBuilder in healpix.core
 

Methods in healpix.core with parameters of type LongRangeSetBuilder
 void HealpixIndex.inRing(long iz, double phi0, double dphi, LongRangeSetBuilder res)
          default in ring with conservative false.
 void HealpixIndex.inRing(long iz, double phi0, double dphi, LongRangeSetBuilder res, boolean conservative)
          returns the list of pixels in RING scheme with latitude in [phi0 - dpi, phi0 + dphi] on the ring iz in [1, 4*nside -1 ] The pixel id numbers are in [0, 12*nside^2 - 1] the indexing is in RING, unless nest is set to 1 NOTE: this is the f90 code 'in_ring' method ported to java with 'conservative' flag to false
